incident.message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.

Overriding `@string/copy` which is marked as private in androidx.preference:preference:1.2.1. If deliberate, use tools:override="true", otherwise pick a different name.
This library supports using KSP instead of kapt, which greatly improves performance. Learn more: https://developer.android.com/studio/build/migrate-to-ksp
